paper_abstract: The point of this paper is to show that the secrecy function attains its maximum at y = 1 on all known extremal unimodular lattices and on some possibly existing even extremal unimodular lattices. This is a special case of a conjecture by Belfiore and Sole. Furthermore, we will give a very simple method to verify or disprove the conjecture on any given unimodular lattice.
paper_title: On a Conjecture by Belfiore and Sole on Some Lattices
